thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com
thread.title: Mr Hunter

author: Mr Hunter
title: Mr Hunter
text: Very efficient service. Good communication beforehand. Representative arrived punctually (indeed early), was polite and knowledgeable and replaced tyre efficiently. This included re-setting the tyre pressure sensor. He told me that the warning about a tyre monitor fault would remain on the dashboard until the car had been driven a mile or two, and this proved to be correct advice.
